name: Midnight Snack (Tawfeeq Irshaidat, Blare Vidal)
description:
Instructions:

[A] to move left

[D] to move right

When at "menu screen" or "restart screen", press [R] to submit score from different ID and name.

[C] to change name.

Objective:

You have 30 seconds to ABSORB as many orbs as you can before time's out while avoiding the light. Good Luck!

Team:

Tawfeeq Irshaidat (Programmer / Lead Director)

Zap_Arts(Artist)

Blare Vidal (Composer / SFX)
